full_description:
Motorola Moto E40 Smartphone (4/64GB)

The Motorola Moto E40 has a 6.5-inch HD+ screen. It has a Full-View punch-hole design in the center. The rear camera has a triple 48+2+2 MP resolution, an LED flash, PDAF, a macro lens, a depth sensor, and Full HD video recording. The front-facing camera has an 8-megapixel resolution. The Moto E40 has a 5000 mAh battery and 10W quick charging technology. It has 4 GB of RAM, an octa-core CPU running at 1.8 GHz, and a Mali G52 GPU. The Unisoc T700 chipset powers it. The gadget has 64 GB of internal storage as well as a dedicated MicroSD slot. This phone has a fingerprint sensor on the back.

Built for Affordable Excellence

The Unisoc Tangula T700 is an entry-level octa-core SoC with two fast ARM Cortex A75 cores at up to 1.8 GHz and six power-efficient ARM Cortex A55 cores at up to 1.8 GHz. This powerful octa-core processor can handle everything from streaming videos to playing games. Moto E40's 4GB of RAM and 64GB of storage ensure that you can run multiple apps at once without any lag.

6.5 inch HD+ IPS Display with 90Hz Refresh Rate

The Moto E40 boasts a 6.5-inch HD+ IPS LCD display with a punch-hole cut-out for the selfie camera. This makes for a cinematic viewing experience, whether you're streaming your favorite show or browsing through your photos.

Triple Camera Setup and 8MP Selfie Camera

The Moto E40 features a triple-camera setup with a 48MP main lens, 2MP macro and a 2MP depth sensor. This allows for stunning photos and videos, whether you're capturing a landscape or a portrait. The camera also has features like night vision, panorama, and portrait mode to help you take your photography to the next level.

Long-Lasting 5000mAh Battery with 10W Charging

The Moto E40 has a 5000mAh battery that can last all day, even with heavy use. It also supports 10-watt fast charging so you can get back to using your phone in no time.

Security at Your Fingertips

The Moto E40 has a fingerprint sensor on the back for secure and convenient unlocking. You can also set up face recognition for an added layer of security.

full_description:
Motorola Moto G31 Smartphone (6/128GB)

The Motorola Moto G31 has a 6.4-inch Full HD+ OLED screen. It has a Full-View punch-hole design in the center. The rear camera has a triple 50+8+2 MP resolution, LED flash, PDAF, macro lens, ultrawide camera, and other features, as well as Full HD video recording. The front-facing camera has a resolution of 13 MP. The Moto G31 has a 5000 mAh battery with 20W rapid charging capability. It has 4 or 6 GB of RAM, an octa-core CPU running at up to 2.0 GHz, and a Mali-G52 MC2 GPU. It runs on a MediaTek Helio G85 (12nm) chipset. The gadget has an internal storage capacity of 64 or 128 GB and a shared MicroSD slot. This phone has a fingerprint sensor on the rear.

Power and Speed, at your Command

The Motorola Moto G31 is powered by the octa-core Mediatek Helio G85 processor, which delivers smooth performance and efficient power usage. The Helio G85 is a gaming-centric processor that delivers a smooth performance even when the phone is running heavy games or multitasking. It runs on Android 11, which offers a smooth and seamless user experience. It comes with 6GB of RAM and 128GB of internal storage, which can be expanded via a microSD card. This means that you'll have plenty of storage space for all your apps, photos, and videos. The phone also comes with a fingerprint sensor, which is located on the back of the phone, for added security and convenience.

50 MP Triple Camera System and 13MP Selfie

The Moto G31 comes with a triple-camera setup on the back, including a 50MP main camera, an 8MP ultrawide, and a 2MP macro camera. With the 50 MP sensor, you can capture sharp images from any angle. The Quad Pixel technology sharpens details in low light. The 118Â° ultra-wide-angle lens captures more of what your eyes see by fitting 4x more3 in the frame than a regular lens. Make snapshots appear like professional portraits. The adjustable depth sensor blurs the background automatically. The front-facing camera is a 13MP sensor which is perfect for taking selfies and video calls.

The Features You Want

The water-repellent construction of the Motorola Moto G31 protects it from spills and splashes. It includes Dolby Atmos, which brings the music closer to you. Put on your headphones and enjoy greater depth and clarity, as well as Dolby Atmos' three-dimensional sound. It incorporates a rear-mounted fingerprint sensor to make it easier to unlock your phone.

Leading Connectivity Options

The Moto G31 also comes with a range of connectivity options, including 4G LTE, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 5.0, GPS, and USB-C. This means that you'll be able to stay connected to the internet, no matter where you are. The phone also comes with a 3.5mm headphone jack, which is great for listening to music or taking calls.

full_description:
Motorola Edge 20 Fusion Smartphone (6/128GB)

The Motorola Edge 20 Fusion has a 6.7-inch Full HD+ OLED screen. It has a Full-View punch-hole design in the center. The rear camera has a triple 108+8+2 MP resolution, LED flash, PDAF, depth sensor, ultrawide camera, and other features, as well as UHD 4K video recording. The front-facing camera has a resolution of 32 MP. The Motorola Edge 20 Fusion has a 5000 mAh battery and a 30W fast charging solution. It has 6GB of RAM, an octa-core CPU that runs at up to 2.4 GHz, and a Mali-G57 MC3 GPU. The chipset is a MediaTek Dimensity 800U 5G (7 nm). The device has 128 GB of internal storage as well as a dedicated MicroSD slot. This phone has a fingerprint sensor on the side.

MediaTek Dimensity 800U 5G processor

The Motorola Edge 20 Fusion is powered by the octa-core MediaTek Dimensity 800 processor with 6 GB RAM and 128 GB storage. And with support for 13 5G bands, you can connect, stream, and download on the fastest networks around the world. Boost performance for games, photos, and more using the dual 5G SIM power.

HDR10+ 90Hz OLED display

Motorola Edge 20 Fusion smartphone comes with a 6.7" ultra-wide AMOLED display having 90 Hz ultra-smooth scrolling & visuals. The display features HDR10+ for more vivid, true-to-life colours and DCI-P3 for a 25% larger colour range.

108 MP Triple Camera System and 32MP Selfie

The Motorola Edge 20 Fusion comes with a triple-camera setup on the back, including a 108MP main camera, an 8MP ultrawide, and a 2MP macro camera. With the 108 MP sensor, you can capture your most true-to-life photos ever with a 108 MP ultra-high-resolution sensor. 9x larger ultra-pixels give you 9x the light sensitivity. The Quad Pixel technology sharpens details in low light. The 118Â° ultra-wide-angle lens captures more of what your eyes see by fitting 4x more3 in the frame than a regular lens. Make snapshots appear like professional portraits. The adjustable depth sensor blurs the background automatically. The front-facing camera is a 32MP sensor which is perfect for taking selfies and video calls.
